title: Prophet Muhammad (pbuh) Prophesied in the Bible in the Book of Isaiah - Dr Zakir Naik
transcript: it's further mentioned the Old Testament in the book of Isaiah chapter number 29 verse number 12 it says the book will be given to him who's not learning and it will be said pray you read this and he will say I am NOT learning and this is exactly what happened when the first revelation came to the last and final messenger prophet mama salah solemn and we know from history that when prophet muhammad peace be upon him went to Joplin or gara Hira there when the first definition was bought by Archangel Gabriel and he said Achra our prophet musa alehsalaam said mana bihari I am NOT learning this is exactly the fulfillment of the prophecy mentioned in the book of Isaiah chapter number 29 verse number 12 that when the book will be given to him who's not learn it and we said pray read this he will say I am NOT learning and this is exactly what prophet Moses Elohim said ma Ana Bukhari I am NOT learning
